{
    "deviceTypeId": 1,
    "deviceClass": "RFID",
    "name": "DataBatching",
    "schemaType": "JSON",
    "schema": "{\"description\":\"Tag Data Events batching configuration\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"Tag Data Events batching configuration\",\"properties\":{\"reportingInterval\":{\"default\":0,\"description\":\"Event Report interval in milli seconds. if -1 or 0 data will be batched until maxPayloadSizePerReport is reached.\",\"type\":\"number\"},\"maxPayloadSizePerReport\":{\"default\":0,\"description\":\"Maximum payload size in bytes. if -1 or 0 data will be batched until reportInterval is expired.\",\"maximum\":256000,\"type\":\"number\"}}}"
}

{
    "deviceTypeId": 1,
    "deviceClass": "RFID",
    "name": "DataRetention",
    "schemaType": "JSON",
    "schema": "{\"description\":\"Tag Data Events Retention Configuration on connection lost\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"Tag Data Events Retention Configuration\",\"properties\":{\"throttle\":{\"default\":500,\"description\":\"Rate (in events per second) to report data events when network is reconnected\",\"maximum\":500,\"type\":\"integer\",\"minimum\":1,\"example\":200},\"maxEventRetentionTimeInMin\":{\"default\":-1,\"description\":\"Maximum event retention time (in minutes). if -1 or 0 events will be retained forever (until reboot)\",\"type\":\"integer\",\"minimum\":-1},\"maxNumEvents\":{\"default\":150000,\"description\":\"Maximum number of events to retain. if 0 will disable retention\",\"maximum\":150000,\"type\":\"integer\",\"minimum\":0}}}"
}

    "deviceTypeId": 1,
    "deviceClass": "RFID",
    "name": "GpioLed",

    "schema": "{\"description\":\"GPIO-LED module configuration\\n\\nConfigure GPO and LED behaviour based on Events generated\\n\\nSupported Events:\\n1. GPI_1_L: event raised when GPI 1 changed from HIGH to LOW\\n2. GPI_1_H: event raised when GPI 1 changed from LOW to HIGH\\n3. GPI_2_L: event raised when GPI 2 changed from HIGH to LOW\\n4. GPI_2_H: event raised when GPI 2 changed from LOW to HIGH\\n5. CLOUD_DISCONNECT: event raised when reader is disconnected from cloud\\n6. CLOUD_CONNECT: event raised when reader is connected to cloud\\n7. TAG_READ: event raised when a tag is read\\n8. RADIO_START: event raised when inventory operation started using START API\\n9. RADIO_STOP: event raised when inventory operation stopped using STOP API\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"GPIO-LED configuration\",\"properties\":{\"GPI_1_L\":{\"description\":\"Array of GPO or LED actions. Actions will be performed sequentially.\",\"title\":\"GPO-LED Action\",\"type\":\"array\",\"items\":{\"anyOf\":[{\"description\":\"Configuration to define operations on single GPO.\\n\\nGPO Action will be skipped if conditions provided is not satisfied.\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"title\":\"GPO Action\",\"properties\":{\"postActionState\":{\"description\":\"Desired GPO pin state after action execution completed\",\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"HIGH\",\"LOW\"]},\"pin\":{\"description\":\"GPO pin number\",\"type\":\"number\",\"enum\":[1,2,3,4],\"example\":1},\"state\":{\"description\":\"Desired GPO pin state\",\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"HIGH\",\"LOW\"]},\"blink\":{\"description\":\"action blink configuration for GPO or LED\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"Action Blink Configuration\",\"properties\":{\"OFF\":{\"description\":\"Toggle GPO or LED for OFF(milliseconds) duration\",\"type\":\"number\",\"minimum\":0},\"DURATION\":{\"description\":\"Total duration in milliseconds to perform blink. 0 will blink GPO or LED forever\",\"type\":\"number\",\"minimum\":0},\"ON\":{\"description\":\"SET GPO or LED to desired state for ON (milliseconds) duration\",\"type\":\"number\",\"minimum\":0}},\"required\":[\"ON\",\"OFF\",\"DURATION\"]},\"type\":{\"description\":\"Action type\",\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"GPO\"]},\"conditions\":{\"oneOf\":[{\"description\":\"Predefined conditions\\n\\nIS_CLOUD_CONNECTED  : Condition will be true when reader is successfully connected to Cloud.\\n\\n~IS_CLOUD_CONNECTED : Condition will be true when reader lost Cloud connectivity.\\n\\nIS_RADIO_ONGOING    : Condition will be true when reader is currenty performing inventory or started inventory operation.\\n\\n~IS_RADIO_ONGOING   : Condition will be true when reader is not performing inventory or stoped inventory operation.\",\"title\":\"Conditions Array\",\"type\":\"array\",\"items\":{\"anyOf\":[{\"enum\":[\"IS_CLOUD_CONNECTED\",\"~IS_CLOUD_CONNECTED\",\"IS_RADIO_ONGOING\",\"~IS_RADIO_ONGOING\"]}],\"type\":\"string\"}},{\"additionalProperties\":false,\"type\":\"object\",\"properties\":{\"operands\":{\"description\":\"Predefined conditions\\n\\nIS_CLOUD_CONNECTED  : Condition will be true when reader is successfully connected to Cloud.\\n\\n~IS_CLOUD_CONNECTED : Condition will be true when reader lost Cloud connectivity.\\n\\nIS_RADIO_ONGOING    : Condition will be true when reader is currenty performing inventory or started inventory operation.\\n\\n~IS_RADIO_ONGOING   : Condition will be true when reader is not performing inventory or stoped inventory operation.\",\"title\":\"Conditions Array\",\"type\":\"array\",\"items\":{\"anyOf\":[{\"enum\":[\"IS_CLOUD_CONNECTED\",\"~IS_CLOUD_CONNECTED\",\"IS_RADIO_ONGOING\",\"~IS_RADIO_ONGOING\"]}],\"type\":\"string\"}},\"operator\":{\"description\":\"operator tobe used for conditions validation\",\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"and\",\"or\"]}}}],\"description\":\"Predefined conditions to trigger GPO or LED actions\\n\\nDefault \\\"and\\\" operator is used when array of conditions is provided.\\n\\noperator \\\"and\\\": Action is performed only when all the conditions provided is true.\\noperator \\\"or\\\": Action is performed only when one of the conditions provided is true.\",\"title\":\"Action Conditions\"}},\"required\":[\"type\",\"pin\",\"state\"]},{\"description\":\"Configuration to define operations on single LED.\\n\\nLED Action will be This value will only be reported if each individual tag read is reported (in other words, if reportFilter duration is set to 0). Otherwise, it will not be reported.\\n  \\n  \\\"CHANNEL will report the channel (in MHz) the reader was using when the tag was inventoried. This value will only be reported if each individual tag read is reported (in other words, if reportFilter duration is set to 0). Otherwise, it will not be reported.\\n  \\n  SEEN_COUNT will report the number of times the tag has been inventoried since the previous report. This value will always be 1 if each individual tag read is reported (in other words, if reportFilter duration is set to 0). \\n  \\n  \\\"PC\\\" will report the PC bits of the inventoried tag as a hex string. \\n  \\n  \\\"XPC\\\" will report the XPC bits of the inventoried tag, if present, as a hex string. \\n  \\n  \\\"CRC\\\" will report the CRC bits of the inventoried tag as a hex string.\\n\\n  \\\"EPC\\\" will report the entire contents of the EPC bank as a hex string. If only a portion of the memory bank is desired, this can be requested by appending a [] to the string and placing the words requested. For instance, if only the first word is desired, the value can be set as \\\"EPC[1]\\\". If the first word and the 3-5 word are desired, the value can be set to \\\"EPC[1,3-5]\\\".\\n  \\n  \\\"TID\\\" will report the entire contents of the TID bank as a hex string. If only a portion of the memory bank is desired, this can be requested by appending a [] to the string and placing the words requested. For instance, if only the first word is desired, the value can be set as \\\"TID[1]\\\". If the first word and the 3-5 word are desired, the value can be set to \\\"TID[1,3-5]\\\".\\n\\n  \\\"USER\\\" will report the entire contents of the USER bank as a hex string. If only a portion of the memory bank is desired, this can be requested by appending a [] to the string and placing the words requested. For instance, if only the first word is desired, the value can be set as \\\"TID[1]\\\". If the first word and the 3-5 word are desired, the value can be set to \\\"TID[1,3-5]\\\".\\n    \\nThe array may also contain an object. The object must contain a single name value pair with the name being set to userDefined and the value being any desired string. Each time the tag is reported, this object will be included.\\n\\n\\nIf absent,\\nSIMPLE mode does not report any additional meta data, PORTAL and CONVEYOR modes reports ANTENNA, and INVENTORY mode reports ANTENNA, RSSI, and SEEN_COUNT.\\n\",\"x-examples\":{\"example-1\":[\"PC\",\"ANTENNA\",\"RSSI\"]},\"items\":{\"type\":[\"string\",\"object\"],\"enum\":[\"RSSI\",\"PHASE\",\"SEEN_COUNT\",\"ANTENNA\",\"CHANNEL\",\"PC\",\"XPC\",\"CRC\",\"EPC\",\"TID\",\"USER\"],\"properties\":{\"userDefined\":{\"type\":\"string\"}}}},\"radioStartConditions\":{\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"radioStartConditions\",\"description\":\"Controls event\",\"default\":0,\"maximum\":100,\"minimum\":0,\"format\":\"int32\"}},\"required\":[\"port\",\"signal\"]}}}},\"radioStopConditions\":{\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"radioStopConditions\",\"description\":\"Controls when an ongoing operation completes. \\n\\nIf this element is absent (or empty), the radio will continue trying to inventory tags until a \\\"stop\\\" is issued.\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"properties\":{\"duration\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"Time to run until radio stops (in seconds)\",\"format\":\"int32\",\"minimum\":0,\"maximum\":1000000},\"antennaCycles\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"The number of cycles through all enabled antennas before stopping the radio\",\"format\":\"int32\",\"minimum\":0,\"maximum\":65535},\"tagCount\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"The number of tags to inventory until the radio stops. Cannot be set at the same time as durationAfterNoMoreUniqueTags\",\"format\":\"int32\",\"minimum\":0,\"maximum\":57344},\"durationAfterNoMoreUniqueTags\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"Duration (in seconds) after not inventorying any more unique tags to stop the radio. Cannot be set at the same time as tagCount\",\"format\":\"int32\",\"minimum\":0,\"maximum\":4095},\"gpis\":{\"type\":\"array\",\"items\":{\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"gpi\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"properties\":{\"port\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"minimum\":1,\"maximum\":2,\"description\":\"GPI Port Number\",\"format\":\"int32\"},\"signal\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"HIGH\",\"LOW\"],\"description\":\"Transition to this GPI will trigger event\"},\"debounceTime\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"Time (in milliseconds) until GPI must remain at signal level to trigger event\",\"default\":0,\"maximum\":100,\"minimum\":0,\"format\":\"int32\"}},\"required\":[\"port\",\"signal\"]}}}},\"reportFilter\":{\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"reportFilter\",\"description\":\"Controls when and how often a tag is reported\\n\\nNOTE: This cannot be set while in \\\"INVENTORY\\\" mode. {
    "deviceTypeId": 3,

    "name": "GpioLed",
    "schemaType": "JSON",
    "schema": "{\"description\":\"GPIO-LED module configuration\\n\\nConfigure GPO and LED behaviour based on Events generated\\n\\nSupported Events:\\n1. GPI_1_L: event raised when GPI 1 changed from HIGH to LOW\\n2. GPI_1_H: event raised when GPI 1 changed from LOW to HIGH\\n3. GPI_2_L: event raised when GPI 2 changed from HIGH to LOW\\n4. GPI_2_H: event raised when GPI 2 changed from LOW to HIGH\\n5. CLOUD_DISCONNECT: event raised when reader is disconnected from cloud\\n6. CLOUD_CONNECT: event raised when reader is connected to cloud\\n7. TAG_READ: event raised when a tag is read\\n8. RADIO_START: event raised when inventory operation started using START API\\n9. RADIO_STOP: event raised when inventory operation stopped using STOP API\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"GPIO-LED configuration\",\"properties\":{\"GPI_1_L\":{\"description\":\"Array of GPO or LED actions. Actions will be performed sequentially.\",\"title\":\"GPO-LED Action\",\"type\":\"array\",\"items\":{\"anyOf\":[{\"description\":\"Configuration to define operations on single GPO.\\n\\nGPO Action will be skipped if conditions provided is not satisfied.\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"title\":\"GPO Action\",\"properties\":{\"postActionState\":{\"description\":\"Desired GPO pin state after action execution completed\",\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"HIGH\",\"LOW\"]},\"pin\":{\"description\":\"GPO pin number\",\"type\":\"number\",\"enum\":[1,2,3,4],\"example\":1},\"state\":{\"description\":\"Desired GPO pin state\",\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"HIGH\",\"LOW\"]},\"blink\":{\"description\":\"action blink configuration for GPO or LED\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"Action Blink Configuration\",\"properties\":{\"OFF\":{\"description\":\"Toggle GPO or LED for OFF(milliseconds) duration\",\"type\":\"number\",\"minimum\":0},\"DURATION\":{\"description\":\"Total duration in milliseconds to perform blink. 0 will blink GPO or LED forever\",\"type\":\"number\",\"minimum\":0},\"ON\":{\"description\":\"SET GPO or LED to desired state for ON (milliseconds) duration\",\"type\":\"number\",\"minimum\":0}},\"required\":[\"ON\",\"OFF\",\"DURATION\"]},\"type\":{\"description\":\"Action type\",\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"GPO\"]},\"conditions\":{\"oneOf\":[{\"description\":\"Predefined conditions\\n\\nIS_CLOUD_CONNECTED  : Condition will be true when reader is successfully connected to Cloud.\\n\\n~IS_CLOUD_CONNECTED : Condition will be true when reader lost Cloud connectivity.\\n\\nIS_RADIO_ONGOING    : Condition will be true when reader is currenty performing inventory or started inventory operation.\\n\\n~IS_RADIO_ONGOING   : Condition will be true when reader is not performing inventory or stoped inventory operation.\",\"title\":\"Conditions Array\",\"type\":\"array\",\"items\":{\"anyOf\":[{\"enum\":[\"IS_CLOUD_CONNECTED\",\"~IS_CLOUD_CONNECTED\",\"IS_RADIO_ONGOING\",\"~IS_RADIO_ONGOING\"]}],\"type\":\"string\"}},{\"additionalProperties\":false,\"type\":\"object\",\"properties\":{\"operands\":{\"description\":\"Predefined If absent, the minimum time will be used. \"},\"delayBetweenAntennaCycles\":{\"title\":\"delayBetweenAntennaCycles\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"type\":\"object\",\"description\":\"This introduces a delay between antenna cycles if no tags are read or if no unique tags are read. This allows the reader to share the spectrum if there are no tags to be read. \\n\\nIf absent, \\non the ATR7000 and the FX9600, delayBetweenAntennas cycles is set to wait for 75 mS if no unique tags are read during a antenna cycle.  \\non the FX7500, delayBetweenAntennas cycles is set to wait for 75 mS if no tags are read during a antenna cycle. \",\"properties\":{\"type\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"DISABLED\",\"NO_TAGS\",\"NO_UNIQUE_TAGS\"],\"description\":\"Condition under which to delay between antenna cycles\"},\"duration\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"Delay between antennas cycles in milliseconds to wait. Will only wait if the type (no tags or no unique tags) is met. If the type is DISABLED, duration must to be set to 0. IF the type is no DISABLED< the value must be set to a non-zero value. \"}},\"required\":[\"type\",\"duration\"]},\"tagMetaData\":{\"title\":\"tagMetaData\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"type\":\"array\",\"description\":\"Controls the metadata that is sent when a tag is reported\\n\\n  ANTENNA will report the antenna port upon which the tag was inventoried.\\n\\n  RSSI will report the rssi (in dbm) of the inventoried tag. If the tag is only reported occasionally (see reportFilter), this tag will be the peak rssi since the last reported read.\\n\\n   \\\"PHASE will report the phase (in degrees) of the inventoried tag. This value will only be reported if each individual tag read is reported (in other words, if reportFilter duration is set to 0). Otherwise, it will not be reported.\\n  \\n  \\\"CHANNEL will report the channel (in MHz) the reader was using when the tag was inventoried. This value will only be reported if each individual tag read is reported (in other words, if reportFilter duration is set to 0). Otherwise, it will not be reported.\\n  \\n  SEEN_COUNT will report the number of times the tag has been inventoried since the previous report. This value will always be 1 if each individual tag read is reported (in other words, if reportFilter duration is set to 0). \\n  \\n  \\\"PC\\\" will report the PC bits of the inventoried tag as a hex string. \\n  \\n  \\\"XPC\\\" will report the XPC bits of the inventoried tag, if present, as a hex string. \\n  \\n  \\\"CRC\\\" will report the CRC bits of the inventoried tag as a hex string.\\n\\n  \\\"EPC\\\" will report the entire contents of the EPC bank as a hex string. If only a portion of the memory bank is desired, this can be requested by appending a [] to the string and placing the words requested. For instance, if only the first word is desired, the value can be set as \\\"EPC[1]\\\". If the first word and the 3-5 word are desired, the value can be set to \\\"EPC[1,3-5]\\\".\\n  \\n  \\\"TID\\\" will report the entire contents of the TID bank as a hex string. If only a portion of the memory bank is desired, this can be requested by appending a [] to the string and placing the words requested. For instance, if only the first word is desired, the value can be set as \\\"TID[1]\\\". If the first word and the 3-5 word are desired, the value can be set to \\\"TID[1,3-5]\\\".\\n\\n  \\\"USER\\\" will report the entire contents of the USER bank as a hex string. If only a portion of the memory bank is desired, this can be requested by appending a [] to the string and placing the words requested. For instance, if only the first word is desired, the value can be set as \\\"TID[1]\\\". If the first word and the 3-5 word are desired, the value can be set to \\\"TID[1,3-5]\\\".\\n    \\nThe array may also contain an object. The object must contain a single name value pair with the name being set to userDefined and the value being any desired string. Each time the tag is reported, this object will be included.\\n\\n\\nIf absent,\\nSIMPLE mode does not report any additional meta data, PORTAL and CONVEYOR modes reports ANTENNA, and INVENTORY mode reports ANTENNA, RSSI, and SEEN_COUNT.\\n\",\"x-examples\":{\"example-1\":[\"PC\",\"ANTENNA\",\"RSSI\"]},\"items\":{\"type\":[\"string\",\"object\"],\"enum\":[\"RSSI\",\"PHASE\",\"SEEN_COUNT\",\"ANTENNA\",\"CHANNEL\",\"PC\",\"XPC\",\"CRC\",\"EPC\",\"TID\",\"USER\"],\"properties\":{\"userDefined\":{\"type\":\"string\"}}}},\"radioStartConditions\":{\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"radioStartConditions\",\"description\":\"Controls when, after a start is issued, the radio starts trying to inventory tags. \\n\\nIf this element is absent, the radio will immediately begin inventorying tags upon a \\\"start\\\" command. \",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"properties\":{\"type\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"GPI\",\"GPI_WITH_RESTART\"]},\"gpis\":{\"type\":\"array\",\"description\":\"\",\"items\":{\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"gpi\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"properties\":{\"port\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"minimum\":1,\"maximum\":2,\"description\":\"GPI Port Number\",\"format\":\"int32\"},\"signal\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"HIGH\",\"LOW\"],\"description\":\"Transition to this GPI will trigger event\"},\"debounceTime\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"Time (in milliseconds) until GPI must remain at signal level to trigger event\",\"default\":0,\"maximum\":100,\"minimum\":0,\"format\":\"int32\"}},\"required\":[\"port\",\"signal\"]}}}},\"radioStopConditions\":{\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"radioStopConditions\",\"description\":\"Controls when an ongoing operation completes. \\n\\nIf this element is absent (or empty), the radio will continue trying to inventory tags until a \\\"stop\\\" is issued.\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"properties\":{\"duration\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"Time to run until radio stops (in seconds)\",\"format\":\"int32\",\"minimum\":0,\"maximum\":1000000},\"antennaCycles\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"The number of cycles through all enabled antennas before stopping the radio\",\"format\":\"int32\",\"minimum\":0,\"maximum\":65535},\"tagCount\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"The number of tags to inventory until the radio stops. Cannot be set at the same time as durationAfterNoMoreUniqueTags\",\"format\":\"int32\",\"minimum\":0,\"maximum\":57344},\"durationAfterNoMoreUniqueTags\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"Duration (in seconds) after not inventorying any more unique tags to stop the radio. Cannot be set at the same time as tagCount\",\"format\":\"int32\",\"minimum\":0,\"maximum\":4095},\"gpis\":{\"type\":\"array\",\"items\":{\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"gpi\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"properties\":{\"port\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"minimum\":1,\"maximum\":2,\"description\":\"GPI Port Number\",\"format\":\"int32\"},\"signal\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"HIGH\",\"LOW\"],\"description\":\"Transition to this GPI will trigger event\"},\"debounceTime\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"Time (in milliseconds) until GPI must remain at signal level to trigger event\",\"default\":0,\"maximum\":100,\"minimum\":0,\"format\":\"int32\"}},\"required\":[\"port\",\"signal\"]}}}},\"reportFilter\":{\"type\":\"object\",\"title\":\"reportFilter\",\"description\":\"Controls when and how often a tag is reported\\n\\nNOTE: This cannot be set while in \\\"INVENTORY\\\" mode. Setting the modeSpecificSetting for interval must be used in \\\"INVENTORY\\\" mode.\",\"additionalProperties\":false,\"properties\":{\"duration\":{\"type\":\"integer\",\"description\":\"Duration (in seconds) to wait to report a tag again once it has already been reported\\nIt should be noted that the way the filter works is that as long as the tag is being read by the reader, it will not report unless the time since the previous report of this tag on this antenna meets the type and duration. \",\"format\":\"int32\",\"minimum\":0,\"maximum\":1000000},\"type\":{\"type\":\"string\",\"enum\":[\"RADIO_WIDE\",\"PER_ANTENNA\"],\"description\":\"Configures the timeout (in seconds) by antenna or for entire radio \\n\"}},\"required\":[\"duration\",\"type\"]}},\"required\":[\"type\"]}"

This value will always be 1 if each individual tag read is reported (in other words, if reportFilter duration is set to 0). \\n  \\n  \\\"PC\\\" will report the PC bits of the inventoried tag as a hex string. \\n  \\n  \\\"XPC\\\" will report the XPC bits of the inventoried tag, if present, as a hex string. \\n  \\n  \\\"CRC\\\" will report the CRC bits of the inventoried tag as a hex string.\\n\\n  \\\"EPC\\\" will report the entire contents of the EPC bank as a hex string. The object must contain a single name value pair with the name being set to userDefined and the value being any desired string. Each time the tag is reported, this object will be included.\\n\\n\\nIf absent,\\nSIMPLE mode does not report any additional meta data, PORTAL and CONVEYOR modes reports ANTENNA, and INVENTORY mode reports ANTENNA, RSSI, and
